description: Number of colors that can mixed with n >= 0 units of yellow, blue, red.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..1000
formula: a(n) = number of triples (i, j, k) with 0 <= i+j+k <= n and gcd(i, j, k) = 1.a(n)=A048134(n)+1. - T. D. Noe, Jan 16 2007
example: a(2)=7: white, primary and secondary colors (null, Y^1, B^1, R^1, Y^1*B^1, Y^1*R^1, B^1*R^1).
mathematica: Accumulate[ Table[ Sum[ MoebiusMu[n/d]*(d+1)*(d+2)/2, {d, Divisors[n]}], {n, 0, 43}]] + 1 (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 16 2013, after _T. D. Noe_ *)
author: Jurjen N.E. Bos (J.Bos at Interpay-ISS dot demon dot nl), _N. J. A. Sloane_, Robin Trew (trew(AT)hcs.harvard.edu)
